ComicInfo.Title: Book Seven
ComicInfo.Summary: THE BOUNCE AND THE VAMP — A MATCH MADE IN HEAVEN! But how does her sordid history tie in with his? Is the world really as dirty as it feels? Only the Darling knows for sure! Watch out — this issue is live like a suicide!
